Class SingleAnimationAdapter<T extends ViewGroup>

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SectionIndexer, SpinnerAdapter, ListViewSetter, ListViewWrapperSetter<T>, Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingBottomInAnimationAdapterGen, SwingLeftInAnimationAdapterGen, SwingRightInAnimationAdapterGen

    public abstract class SingleAnimationAdapter<T extends ViewGroup>
extends AnimationAdapter<T>
    An implementation of AnimationAdapter which applies a single Animator to views.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnimators

        public com.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator[] getAnimators(ViewGroup parent,
                                                    View view)
        Description copied from class: AnimationAdapter
        Returns the Animators to apply to the views. In addition to the returned Animators, an alpha transition will be applied to the view.
        Specified by:
        getAnimators in class AnimationAdapter<T extends ViewGroup>
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the view
        view - The view that will be animated, as retrieved by getView().

      • getAnimator

        protected abstract com.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator getAnimator(ViewGroup parent,
                                                 View view)
        Get the Animator to apply to the View.
        Parameters:
        parent - the ViewGroup which is the parent of the View.
        view - the View that will be animated, as retrieved by AnimationAdapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup).
